blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: When this Pokémon is at low HP, its Fire-type moves deal an extra damage die.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: When this Pokémon enters battle, nearby foes suffer reduced Attack.

keen_eye.name: Keen Eye
keen_eye.description: This Pokémon cannot have its accuracy reduced and ignores effects that would obscure its vision.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: This Pokémon ignores barriers, screens, and similar protective effects when using its moves.

own_tempo.name: Own Tempo
own_tempo.description: This Pokémon cannot become confused and ignores effects that would force it to act erratically.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: This Pokémon's Speed increases by +1 each time it flinches.

inner_focus.name: Inner Focus
inner_focus.description: This Pokémon cannot flinch and is immune to effects that would cause it to flinch.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: This Pokémon's status moves can be used as reactions

flash_fire.name: Flash Fire
flash_fire.description: This Pokémon is immune to Fire-type moves and its next Fire-type move deals an increased damage die if it has been hit by one.

flame_body.name: Flame Body
flame_body.description: When a foe makes physical contact with this Pokémon, there is a chance they will be burned. (roll a 10 on a conditional die)

water_absorb.name: Water Absorb
water_absorb.description: This Pokémon heals when hit by a Water-type move instead of taking damage.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: This Pokémon's Speed increases by +1 in sunny weather.

sand_rush.name: Sand Rush
sand_rush.description: This Pokémon's Speed increases by +1 in a sandstorm.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: When this Pokémon is at low HP (25%), its Bug-type moves deal an extra damage die.

static.name: Static
static.description: When a foe makes physical contact with this Pokémon, there is a chance they will be paralyzed. (roll a 10 on a conditional die)

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: This Pokémon is immune to Ground-type moves and effects.

shell_armor.name: Shell Armor
shell_armor.description: This Pokémon cannot be struck by critical hits.

rock_head.name: Rock Head
rock_head.description: This Pokémon does not take recoil damage from moves that have recoil.

natural_cure.name: Natural Cure
natural_cure.description: This Pokémon heals from status conditions when it switches out of battle.

serene_grace.name: Serene Grace
serene_grace.description: This Pokémon's moves have an increased chance of causing secondary effects. (8-10 on conditional die.)

friend_guard.name: Friend Guard
friend_guard.description: Allies of this Pokémon take reduced damage from attacks.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: This Pokémon ignores all foe's stat changes when attacking or being attacked.

cloud_nine.name: Cloud Nine
cloud_nine.description: This Pokémon negates all weather effects while it is in battle.

run_away.name: Run Away
run_away.description: This Pokémon's movement speed is increased by 10 feet

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: This Pokémon's moves of its primary type deal an extra damage die.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: This Pokémon senses when a foe has a move that is super effective against it or has a one-hit KO move.

clear_body.name: Clear Body
clear_body.description: This Pokémon's stats cannot be lowered by foe's moves or abilities.

light_metal.name: Light Metal
light_metal.description: This Pokémon's weight is halved, affecting moves and abilities that depend on weight.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: This Pokémon is immune to ball and bomb moves.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves and effects.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: This Pokémon is immune to weather effects and powder-based moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: When this Pokémon is at low HP, its Water-type moves deal an extra damage die.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: This Pokémon's Special Attack increases by +2 whenever one of its stats is lowered by a foe.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: This Pokémon acts later in the turn order than normal.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type move, its Attack increases by +1.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: This Pokémon cannot use held items in battle.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: This Pokémon's Speed increases by +1 whenever it is hit by a Bug, Ghost, or Dark-type move.
